channel.title: I cant seem to use my no-ip only
channel.description:
how do i use my no-ip.info only? I have port trigger on my computer and no-ip DUC running, but i cant get it to work. Can someone plz show me?
tyvm

item.title: I cant seem to use my no-ip only
item.dc:creator: @bloodbath32 bloodbath32
item.description:
@bloodbath32 wrote:

Okay when you’re loagged in at www.no-ip.org on the left side pannel you should see “ADD” clcik that, and type in where it says host name like for example: bobscape then once you’re finished adding the host go to yuor DUC and click refresh, and it should be there, click the box to check it and the guy should go happy like this and then it should all be working.

Read full topic
item.source: I cant seem to use my no-ip only
